::Zardus/DevilDuer/Havoc::

Zardus recieves Nemesis Enforcer's message and looks at 
DevilDuer. "Can you go to Havoc and tell him to get to the battle and 
take his group as well?"

DevilDuer nods, walking out of the room.

The Iron Fist reports Ominous and Akron's conversation to Zardus. He 
frowns. He'd have to find out what this chamber of Ominous's was.

"I'm afraid I don't have any troops to spare at the moment," Zardus 
says to Cerberus, "Destroying the Cybertronian Fire is taking a bit 
more than expected."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Havoc!"

Havoc turns his head to see a panting DevilDuer. "Yeah?"

"Zardus wants you at the Cybertronian Fire," DevilDuer says, "Along 
with the rest of your group."

Havoc nods. "Allright." He looks at Vlad. "THere's a battle at the 
Cybertronian Fire, the Maximal Base. If you wanna participate in it, 
follow me."

He runs off down the hallway, sending a comm to all his team to get 
to the Cybertronian Fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Detecting gunfire within the base, the Iron Fist drops two panels to 
isolate Lady Hawk and Gotron in the hallways, allerting Zardus.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer cursed as most of his shots missed, and the rest 
were 
> intercepted by some idiot he'd never seen before.
> 
> "YOU'RE ALL AGA--" he was thrown to his left from Tavatron's blast, 
Iron 
> Raptor's powerful looking blasts going right by him.
> 
> He straightened out, cursing madly like a pack of donkeys in rage.  
He 
> activated his comm. unit to to the inner monologue comm. unit in 
Zardus' 
> head.  
> 
> "This is Nemesis Enforcer.  There are constant new factors.  Send 
> reinforcements.  Situation is not critical, but we need 
reinforcements for 
> final victory.  If possible, the War Machines." he said, raising 
his rifle as 
> he waited for a reply.  "You want to play?  I'll give you something 
to play 
> with, witch!" he yelled, firing off twenty-five rapid laser bolts 
off at Iron 
> Raptor's chest.
